title: Live in your dream home at Aster Meadow Apartments! 2 Bd/2 ba, 1057 SqFt
neighborhood: Vadnais Heights - Near Bridgewood Park & White Bear Lake
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Aster Meadow Apartments!', 'Located at:', '4143-4145 Centerville Rd', 'Vadnais Heights, MN 55127', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1057 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1800 - $2200/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Aster Meadow Luxury Apartments redefines apartment living in Vadnais Heights, MN.', 'With first-class amenities in a beautiful setting, our residents enjoy breathtaking views in a prime location.', 'Take advantage of spacious floor plans, heated underground parking, a game room, fitness center, and much more.', 'We are also conveniently located near the Twin Cities area for work and entertainment.', 'Community Features:', '● Bike Racks', '● Conference Room', '● Controlled Access', '● Emergency Maintenance', '● Fitness Center', '● FOB Controlled Building Access', '● Garden Plaza', '● Library', '● Playground', '● Walking/Biking Trails', '● 16-Acre View Of Natural Wetland', '● Brand New Appliances', '● Heated Gazebo', '● Heated Underground Parking', '● Huge Covered Decks', '● Large Grill Area', '● On Site Management & Maintenance', '● Outdoor Fireplace, Fire Table & Kitchen', '● Pet Wash Station', '● Private Offices', 'Unit Features:', '● Balcony/Patio', '● Carpet', '● Central Heating & Cooling', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Eat-in Kitchen', '● Oven', '● Pantry', '● Refrigerator', '● Wi-Fi', '● Den', '● Extra Large Walk-In Closets', '● Gorgeous View', '● Granite/Quartz Countertops', '● High-Speed Internet Access: Cable & Century', 'OnLink Ready', '● Microwave', '● Stainless Steel Appliances', '● Storage Lockers Available', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'SundayBy Appointment', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed.', 'Maximum Dogs: 2, Maximum Cats: 1, Maximum weight: 60 lbs., Initial fee: 300, Additional rent: $50, Deposit: $300', 'Leasing Options:', 'Variable, Monthly, 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '0EB98524C1F8479B']
